tone_framing: Frame the tour as a journey through time to uncover the secrets of ancient Chinese art and culture.
key_takeaways: Red represents luck, happiness, and power in Chinese culture.
The intricate designs of Qing dynasty robes reflect the wearer's social status and identity.
Art objects can reveal stories about trade, politics, and daily life in ancient China.
creative_activities: Design your own imperial robe using red and other colors to symbolize values important to you.
